content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: LBORNRLO
      operator: equal_to
      value: LBORRESU
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0186
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: LBORNRLO is expressed using the units in LBORRESU
Outcome:
  Message: LBORNRLO is not expressed using the units in LBORRESU
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0186
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Lower end of reference range for continuous measurement
                  in original units.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Section: 6.3.5.6
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - LB

json.Description: LBORNRLO is expressed using the units in LBORRESU

Outcome.Message: LBORNRLO is not expressed using the units in LBORRESU

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Lower end of reference range for continuous measurement in original units.
